[size=large]PYROMANCER[/size]

61 pyro 5 Harb and 10 Archon (7harb 8 archon or 8 Harb 7 Archon work as well).

Approximate number to see the gap between ability.

Searing vitality 5k damage (instant cast)
Flame Bolt 7k damage (instant cast)
Fireball 8k (16k*) damage (2 sec. cast) *Should proc twice every time
Countdown 10k damage (instant cast)
Cinderburst 15k damage (instant cast)
Fulminate 20k damage (instant cast)
Fussillade 20k Damage (1.6sec. cast)
Whitering Flame 35k Damage (5 sec. channel)
Flame Volley 45k damage (3 sec. channel)

Things to know about buff : Pyromancers Aegis will give your Fireball cast an extra fireball every 3 sec.
-Extinguish : give you 5 instant cast fireball if you have 5 stack of combust (3 if 3 stack of combust)
-So: if you cast 5 fireball in a row with this, only 2 will proc an extra fireball from Aegis
-So : If you cast 1 fireball followed by 2 instant cast 5 times in a row, all your 5 fireball will proc twice
-Extinguish last 15 sec. so: if you start by casting a fireball you should have 2 sec left on this buff when you'll be finish casting your 5 fireball.
-So : Flame Volley is a 3 sec. cast, this can replace 2 instant cast if you can't find any.
-Fussillade is 1.6 sec. cast so to short to replace 2 instant cast but can still be use if you plan to wait 0.4 sec after casting it.

A good start for a fight might look like this: (Be Full charge before you start a fight)
Prime
Extinguish
Fireball
Flame Bolt
Countdown
Fireball
Searing Vitality
Fulminate
Fireball
Fllame Volley
Fireball
Flame Bolt
Countdown
Fireball
HEAT WAVE
Fireball until Flame Bolt and countdown need to be refresh (5-6)
Fireball until Heat wave is done (5-6)

Extinguish
Fireball
Flame Bolt
Countdown
Fireball
Searing Vitality
Fulminate
Fireball
Fllame Volley
Fireball
Flame Bolt
Countdown
Fireball

we're now out of CD for a while.

-Since Aegis proc an extra fireball every 3 sec., it's a good idea to cast 1 instant after each fireball so all your fireball proc twice.
-Save your CD to be able to use them with Extinguish.
-Pop Flame rupture if you have more then 1 target.
-Use Withering Flames to switch to a target that may die fast and use Prime to go back on your main target to apply your 5 stack of combust.
-Using Withering Flames in your main rotation may just drain your charge that could be use for Internalize Charges
-Use internalize Charge as soon as you get full charge after you've cast your Fulminate. Turn it off if Fulminate is to be rdy to use in the next 10 sec.

Don't use macro for Flamebolt and countdown since you might find yourself force to cast 4 flamebolt before you can refresh countdown

Macro:

#show Cinder Burst
suppressmacrofailures
Cast Cinder Burst
Cast Fireball

#show Scorch
suppressmacrofailures
stopcasting
Cast Scorch

[size=large]Warlock[/size]

http://rift.magelo.com/en/soultree/betaStorm2012#fgQ/ell5iGEBak8/ir2


#show Void Bolt
suppressmacrofailures
cast Countdown
cast Draining Bolt
*
cast Void Bolt

* You may want to add Neddra's Grasp at this place or cast it yourself. Not usefull agaisnt every target and very low dps. I use it before radiate death only.

**Neddra's Torture should be refresh everytime you cast persist. Do 10k damage after 16 sec.


The main goal is: Cast your 5 dot when the fight start and keep them up using 1 of the 3 option we have to refresh them. Play with the 3 buff that increase damage while doing this.

D.O.T. are: Life Leech, Necrosis, Darktouch, Defile and Atrophy (Countdown is a dot but it's in the macro and wont be refresh like other dot)
Death door is the dot no. 6 and you'll be able to cast it when your target reach 50% of he's HP

CD Rotation is: Sacrifice life damage for 15 sec, / Empowered Darkness for 15 sec. / Sacrifice life damage for 15 sec. / Contaminate for 15 sec. and repeat again and again.

Refresh d.o.t. rotation is: Void barrage, / spam macro for 10 sec, / Persist, spam macro for 10 sec. and repeat again and again with the CD rotation.

So, start the CD rotation, cast your dot, start the refresh rotation and spam your macro.

There's many ability i did'nt talk about, they're all usefull, just have to read them.

[size=large]Necrolist[/size]

The Build

http://rift.magelo.com/en/soultree/betaStorm2012#fhll0wkI/hkAy2GFyA4/i

Reasoning for Points: 44 into Elementalist gives you Elemental Armor, 31 into Necro gives you unlimited mana.

Benefits of this spec: Best Target switching mages have (Same as 61 ele). Better dps than 61 Elementalist. A good amount of aoe (from pet). Unlimited Mana. 2 quick summons.

Shadow Revenant vs Greater Skeletal Zealot: They will give you the same amount of DPS on dummy, but If there is just one more target the Revenant pulls ahead as the victor.

Buffs:

Elemental Armor- Increases damage by 15% and Charge gain by 15%

Synergize- causes pet damaging abilities to restore 3 charge to mage. (make sure to cast this everytime you summon a pet)

Macro:

#show elemental burst
suppressmacrofailures
cast elemental burst
cast stormbolt
cast desecrate
cast icy carapace
cast flame bolt
cast crystalline missiles
cast break free
cast sever bonds
cast bone frenzy

*if you want to be lazy, throw your cooldowns in there too -.-*

Cooldowns:

Intensify Elements- 100% damage increase to pet, 50% increase to pet. 2min cooldown. Use with Rushing Elements.

Rushing Elements- Reduces GCD to 1sec for 15 sec. 1min cooldown. Use with Intensify and half way thru intensify's cooldown.

Empty the Crypts- Summons 4 Zombies for 20 sec. 1min 30sec cooldown.

Charge Consumers:

Lich Form- Unlimited Mana. 10% damage increase to pet and yourself. Make sure when you are using lich form to use at 100 charge so you'll have 50 charge for Bone frenzy.

Bone Frenzy- Increases pet damage by 30% for 15 sec. 20sec cooldown. -50 charge.

"The Rotation":

Spam your macro, Keep up ignite and Necrosis.

AOE: Spam your macro, Throw down burning ground and grave rot. Keep up ignite.

UTILITY:

A purge! Woot.

Use the Elementalist Crystal*
